verses.verse: Set the trumpet <WH7782> to your mouth. <WH2441> He shall come as an eagle <WH5404> against <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> because <WH3282> they have transgressed <WH5674> my covenant, <WH1285> and trespassed against <WH5921> my law. <WH8451>
Israel <WH3478> shall cry <WH2199> to me, My God, <WH430> we know <WH3045> you.
Israel <WH3478> has cast <WH2186> off the thing that is good: <WH2896> the enemy <WH341> shall pursue <WH7291> him.

They have set up kings, <WH4428> but not by me: they have made princes, <WH8269> and I knew <WH3045> it not: of their silver <WH3701> and their gold <WH2091> have they made <WH6213> them idols, <WH6091> that they may be cut <WH3772> off.

Your calf, <WH5695> O Samaria, <WH8111> has cast <WH2186> you off; my anger <WH639> is kindled <WH2734> against them: how <WH349> long <WH5704> will it be ere <WH3808> they attain <WH3201> to innocence? <WH5356>
For from Israel <WH3478> was it also: the workman <WH2796> made <WH6213> it; therefore it is not God: <WH430> but the calf <WH5695> of Samaria <WH8111> shall be broken <WH7616> in pieces.

For they have sown <WH2232> the wind, <WH7307> and they shall reap <WH7114> the whirlwind: <WH5492> it has no <WH369> stalk; <WH7054> the bud <WH6779> shall yield <WH6213> no <WH369> meal: <WH7058> if <WH194> so be it yield, <WH6213> the strangers <WH2114> shall swallow <WH1104> it up.
Israel <WH3478> is swallowed <WH1104> up: now shall they be among the Gentiles <WH1471> as a vessel <WH3627> wherein is no <WH369> pleasure. <WH2656>
For they are gone <WH5927> up to Assyria, <WH804> a wild <WH6501> ass <WH6501> alone <WH909> by himself: Ephraim <WH669> has hired <WH8566> lovers. <WH158>

Yes, <WH1571> though <WH3588> they have hired <WH8566> among the nations, <WH1471> now <WH6258> will I gather <WH6908> them, and they shall sorrow <WH2490> a little <WH4592> for the burden <WH4853> of the king <WH4428> of princes. <WH8269>
Because <WH3588> Ephraim <WH669> has made <WH6213> many <WH7235> altars <WH4196> to sin, <WH2398> altars <WH4196> shall be to him to sin. <WH2398>
I have written <WH3789> to him the great <WH7239> things of my law, <WH8451> but they were counted <WH2803> as a strange <WH2114> thing.

They sacrifice <WH2076> flesh <WH1320> for the sacrifices <WH2077> of my offerings, <WH1890> and eat <WH398> it; but the LORD <WH3068> accepts <WH7521> them not; now <WH6258> will he remember <WH2142> their iniquity, <WH5771> and visit <WH6485> their sins: <WH2403> they shall return <WH7725> to Egypt. <WH4714>

For Israel <WH3478> has forgotten <WH7911> his Maker, <WH6213> and builds <WH1129> temples; <WH1964> and Judah <WH3063> has multiplied <WH7235> fenced <WH1219> cities: <WH5892> but I will send <WH7971> a fire <WH784> on his cities, <WH5892> and it shall devour <WH398> the palaces <WH759> thereof.
